  • General Interface

General Interface¶

Episcope general interface containing :

video player : * video playback * play/pause, skip>>, skip<<, review buttons * advance and rewind by 1s and pause * synchronised sound * good speed

annotations : * pre-load symptoms * cascading menus on left * correct initialization of symptoms * retrieve symptoms from a list * retrieve start and end times * display symptoms on the right * scrollable symptoms * pop-up to modify symptoms

files : * generate frieze * generate a report * generate a symptom file

modification of the general design and buttons of the drop-down menus and the video progress management buttons everything is in english

version : 0.9

class general_interface_V9.FriseSymptomes(InterfaceGenerale, MenuDeroulant)¶

Bases: object

Classe permettant de généré une frise chronologique récapitulant l’ensemble des symptomes présent lors de la crise épileptique

interfaceGenerale¶
Type:

InterfaceGenerale

MenuDeroulant¶
Type:

Menu_symptomes

afficher()¶

Récuperation de la liste de symptomes instanciée dans class interface generale fonction update right panel

class general_interface_V9.InterfaceGenerale(fenetre)¶

Bases: object

Classe interface Générale qui donne le visuel global de l’interface graphique.

Elle est représenter sous forme de fenetre et permet aux autres classes de s’intégrer dedans. Elle appel la classe Lecteur_video, FriseSymptomes et Menu_symptomes

Atributes:

ListeSymptomes (list): liste des symptomes s’actualisant au fur et a mesure

A completer !!!

get_current_video_time()¶

Permet d’avoir le temps actuel de la vidéo

get_video_duration()¶

Permet d’avoir le temps total de la vidéo

lire_fichier(nom_fichier)¶

Ouvre un fichier texte le lit et sauvegarde les informations dans une liste

load_symptoms()¶

charge une liste de symptomes a partir d’un fichier

ouvrir_video()¶

Ouvre la vidéo en appelant la class Lecteur_video

ouvrir_video_noire()¶

Ouvre la vidéo noire en appelant la class Lecteur_video

rapport()¶

ecrit le rapport de la crise

sauvegarde()¶

sauvegarde de la liste de symtptomes dans un fichier texte fait appel a la classe save

supprimer(selection, container)¶
text_sympt(sympt)¶

crée le texta a afficher dans le right_pannel

Parameters:

sympt (Symptome) – symptome dont on crée le texte

Returns:

texte a afficher contenant les bonnes infos

Return type:

text (string)

update_right_panel(attributs=[], is_start_time=False)¶

Permet de gerer l’affichage dans la partie de droite du temps de début/fin des symptomes et gestion du pop-up pour modifier un symptome.

Parameters:

attributs (list) – liste d’initialisation du symptome | defaut = []

class general_interface_V9.LecteurVideo(InterfaceGenerale)¶

Bases: object

Video player class that manages the different functionalities of the video.

Functionalities supported :

  • opening a video using the file explorer

  • opening a dark video - in case there is no video to actually open

  • sychronizing sound and video

  • buttons gestion

This class calls the InterfaceGenerale class

\*\*A completer**
afficher_menu_annotations(event)¶

Retrieve the coordinates by clicking on the video.

It currently displays a red cross. But you can use this red cross to display the symtoms by hovering over it with the cursor.

afficher_video()¶

Allows to display and play the video.

Resizes the frames of the video to match thoses of the middle frame computes and displays the total and elapsed time of the video

ajouter_plus_rouge(canvas, x, y, taille)¶

Displays the red cross for 1 second where one clicks on the video

Parameters:

  • canvas (tk.Canvas) – the canvas of the video

  • x (int) – x-coordinate of the cross

  • y (int) – y-coordinate of the cross

  • taille (int) – size of ????

avance_progress()¶

advances the video by one wave and ensures that the sound also advances

avancer()¶

??

charger_son_video(file_path)¶

Stops the previous audio, and extracts and loads the new audio track associated with the selected video. It also cleans up the resources used during the process.

configurer_barre_progression()¶

??

format_duree(seconds)¶

Converts the time in seconds in a more readable format : minutes and secondes

manual_update_progress(value)¶

??

mettre_a_jour_frame_video(frame)¶

Checks if each frame of the video is correctly processed, resized and displayed in the GUI

mettre_a_jour_temps_video()¶

Ensures that the displayed time of the video is regularly updated and that the video plays smoothly. It also ensures the sinchronization between the video advancement and the real time

ouvrir_video()¶

Opens a video with the file explorer. Once chosen, it plays the video in the middle_frame

ouvrir_video_noire()¶

Opens the black video. The black video must be in the same folder as the code : “video_noire.mp4”

pause_lecture()¶

Manage the play/pause state of the video

preparer_son_video(file_path)¶

Prepares the sound of the video from the original video

recule_progress()¶

Rewinds the video by 1 second, ensuring that the sound is synchronised with the video.

revoir_video()¶

Allows to play the video again

class general_interface_V9.Menu_symptomes(master, interface_generale, couleur, bordure, largeur)¶

Bases: CTkFrame

Class used to instantiate drop-down menus displaying symptoms in a frame on the left of the interface.

create_dropdown_menus(master, largeur)¶

Creates a drop-down menu containing the various symptoms classified according to whether they are objective or subjective.

Parameters:

  • master (any) – widget in which to display the menus

  • largeur (int) – width of the frame of the menus

create_submenu(parent_menu, symptom, sub_symptoms, my_font, on_select)¶

Creates drop-down sub-menus after selecting a symptom. The items in this menu specify the location of the symptom on the body and its laterality.

Parameters:

  • parent_menu (Menu) – Drop down menu associated to the selected symptom

  • symptom (symptome) – Selected symptom

  • sub_symptoms (list) – Complementary list to the selected symptom (indicates position/lateralisation)

  • my_font (Font) – font size

  • on_select (function) – symptoms command selection

on_select_obj(selection)¶

Objective symptoms selector

Sets the right attributes depending on the menu selection to update the symptom list Recovers data linked to the video to obtain the current time

Parameters:

selection (path) – selected symptom

on_select_subj(selection)¶

subjective symptoms selector

Sets the right attributes depending on the menu selection to update the symptom list Recovers data linked to the video to obtain the current time

Parameters:

selection (path) – selected symptom

read_symptoms_from_file(file_name)¶

Reads the text files containing the list of symptoms to fill the menus

Symptoms must be written with specific separators

Example :

Negative myoclonus[Oriented(Left;Right;Bilateral);Hand/Superior limb;Foot/Inferior limb]

Parameters:

file_name (string) – file path

Returns:

menu title symptoms (list): list of symptoms to fill in the menus

Return type:

title (string)
